popover.primary: A mastery path focused on stabbin' things
A mastery path focused on survivability which means mor' killin' later
A mastery path focused on buffs and group support, cause everyone has some killin' ta do

data.name: Trip 'Em Up
data.note:
Needs da' Gud Plan!
Leads to da' Best Plan!!
data.description: You "trip" your opponent by hacking at their legs for 164 damage, reducing their movement speed by 40% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Skull Thumper
data.note:
Needs da' Best Plan!!
No Plan after dis!
data.description: A pounding blow to your opponent's skull that deals 239 damage and for the next 10 seconds their head will ring for 112 Corporeal damage whenever they are Critically hit.

data.name: Changin' Da Plan
data.description:
You suddenly realize that you could smash things better with a different plan.

No Plan: You gain Da Good Plan.
Da Good Plan: You gain Da Best Plan.
Da Best Plan: You gain Da Good Plan.

data.name: Da Toughest!
data.note: War Bellow
data.description:
A grand war cry to proclaim yourself da toughest! All your attacks gain a 25% chance to increase your wounds by 48 for 10 seconds. You will be healed by the amount increased.

You may only have 1 War Bellow active at a time.

data.name: Follow 'me Lead
data.note: Leads to da' Gud Plan!
data.description: Deals 164 damage. Buffs Defensive Targets Weapon Skill by 120 for 20 seconds.

data.name: Tuffer 'n Nails
data.note:
Requires Shield
Needs da' Gud Plan!
Leads to da' Best Plan!!
data.description: Deals 202 damage. Increases Armor by 990 for 20 seconds.

data.name: Taunt
data.description: You enrage your opponent, interrupting any currently building abilities and forcing monsters to attack you. While taunted your opponent will take 30% more damage from your attacks. This effect will fade after 15 seconds or after your opponent has hit you 3 times.

data.name: Da Big Un'
data.note:
Requires Great Weapon
Needs da' Best Plan!!
No Plan after dis!
data.description: Deals 251 damage to all targets 25 feet in front of you.

data.name: Right in Da Jibblies
data.note:
Needs da' Gud Plan!
Leads to da' Best Plan!!
data.description: Deals 239 damage. Reduces target's Weapon Skill by 120 for 20 seconds.

data.name: Get 'Em
data.description: An encouraging bellow that causes group members within 100 feet to regenerate Action Points 20% faster for 15 seconds.

data.name: Hold The Line!
data.note: Requires Shield
data.description:
You focus your defenses against enemy fire, increasing your chances to dodge and disrupt by 45% for 12 seconds. You will also defend all allies behind you, up to 50 feet away, increasing their chances to dodge and disrupt by 15% as long as they remain at your back. Allies may have this effect stacked on them up to 3 times.
This effect will end if you break your concentration, or run out of action points.

data.name: Save Da Runts
data.note: Only usable on other players
data.description: You defend one of your groupmates and try to take attacks meant for them. As long as you are within 30 feet of them, any damage that they suffer and all hate that they cause will be split evenly between the two of you.

data.name: Wot armor?
data.note: Leads to da' Gud Plan!
data.description: Deals 127 damage. Reduces armor by 990 for 20 seconds.

data.name: Juggernaut
data.description: You become filled with unstoppable power, removing all snaring, rooting, silencing, and disarming effects.

data.name: Da Biggest!
data.note: War Bellow
data.description:
A mighty war cry that weakens your foes and gives you their strengths. All your melee attacks gain a 25% chance to randomly steal 120 stat points from targets within 30 feet of you for 10 seconds. During this time, both you and groupmates within 100 feet will benefit from the stolen stats.

You may only have 1 War Bellow active at a time.

data.name: Savin' Me Hide
data.note:
Needs da' Best Plan!!
No Plan after dis!
data.description: Deals 277 damage. Increases your Toughness by 120 for 20 seconds. Group members within 100 feet will take only 80% incoming magic damage for the next 4 seconds.

data.name: Big Slash
data.note:
Needs da' Gud Plan!
Leads to da' Best Plan!!
data.description: Deals 105 damage to targets 25 feet from you, and knocks them back.

data.name: Challenge
data.description: You challenge all opponents in front of you, forcing monsters to attack you. While challenged, your opponents will deal only 70% damage to everyone other than you. This effect will fade after 15 seconds or after your opponent has hit you 3 times.

data.name: Shatter Enchantment
data.note: Target must have an Enchantment
data.description: A shattering attack that removes one Enchantment from your enemy and do 127 damage.

data.name: Da Greenest
data.note: War Bellow
data.description:
A Waaaghy bellow that raises resistances when hit. Incoming attacks have a 25% chance to increase resistance against that type of damage by 378 for 10 seconds on all group members within 100 feet. Physical damage will increase armor by 990 for 10 seconds for all group members within 100 feet.

You may only have 1 War Bellow active at a time.

data.name: Where You Going?
data.description: You root four enemies within 30 feet of you, preventing them fom moving for 5 seconds. There is a 50% chance of the root breaking with every hit.

data.name: Big Swing
data.note:
Needs da' Gud Plan!
Leads to da' Best Plan!!
data.description: Deals 98 damage to targets within 30 feet. Debuffs target's Strength by 120 for 20 seconds.

data.name: Shut Yer Face
data.note:
Needs da' Best Plan!!
No Plan after dis!
data.description: Deals 427 damage. Silences target for 4 seconds.

data.name: 'Ave Another One
data.description: Follow 'me Lead will deal an additional 375 damage over 5 seconds.

data.name: Lookin' For Opp'tunity
data.description: Clobber now removes 6 percentage points from your opponents Morale.

data.name: Good Wif Shield
data.description: Increases Block Chance by 10% when using a shield.

data.name: Dat Was Great!
data.description: Increases the duration of "Wot Armor?" by 10 seconds, and will now reduces target's toughness by 120.

data.name: Youz see me blok' dat'?!
data.description: Whenever you Block an attack you gain 4 percentage points worth of Morale. This effect will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Bring 'Em On
data.description: Whenever you Parry, you immediately put your "Best Plan" in motion.

data.name: Loudmouth
data.description: War Bellows (Da Biggest, Da Toughest, Da Greenest) now also deal 225 damage to your offensive target.

data.name: Can Youz Hear Me Now?
data.description: Cooldown on Shut Yer Face is reduced by 5 seconds and damage is increased to 614

data.name: Empowered Mastery
data.description: Your mastery level is increased by 1 in {SPEC_1: Component Id undefined not found}

data.name: Eternal Mastery
data.description: Your mastery level is increased by 1 in {SPEC_2: Component Id undefined not found}

data.name: Infinite Mastery
data.description: Your mastery level is increased by 1 in {SPEC_3: Component Id undefined not found}

data.name: Augment Vigor
data.description: Increases your Wounds by 160.

data.name: Quit Yer Squabblin'
data.description: Every member of your group within 100 feet gains an additional 10% chance to Parry and Dodge for 30 seconds.

data.name: Walk it off!
data.description: Each group member within 100 feet gains 160 Toughness for 30 seconds.

data.name: Deafening Bellow!
data.description: All targets within 30 feet of you take 1200 damage and are Silenced, unable to use Magic for 5 seconds.

data.name: Focused Offense
data.description: You deal 15% more damage and all enemy monsters will hate you 15% less than normal, but your armor is reduced by 33%.

data.name: Rugged
data.description: Increases Toughness by 160.

data.name: Menace
data.description: Enemy monsters will hate you 100% more than normal on all attacks.

data.name: Unstoppable Juggernaut
data.description: Juggernaut's cooldown is reduced to 20 seconds.

data.name: Demolishing Strike
data.description: A powerful melee attack that reduces armor by 1056 and deals 900 damage over 15 seconds

data.name: Shield Wall
data.note: Requires Shield
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, your chance to block is almost guaranteed.

data.name: Champion's Challenge
data.description:
Both you and your target are held tightly in place for 10 seconds, and neither one of you can move.
This effect can not be dispelled or broken.

data.name: Raze
data.description: Repeatedly attack all enemies in a line in front of you, inflicting 300 damage every second  for 3 seconds, up to 65 feet away.

data.name: Distracting Bellow
data.description: A loud shout that startles your target and all enemies within 30 feet of them, reducing their damage to 50% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Immaculate Defense
data.description: An impressive display of defense which reduces incoming damage by 75% for both you and all group members within 100 feet of you for 10 seconds.

data.name: I'm Da Biggest!
data.description: Increases your Wounds by 160.

data.name: Don't Bother Me None
data.description: Increases your Spirit resistance by 252.

data.name: Stab You Gooder
data.description: All of your critical hits will deal 25% more bonus critical damage.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30 for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Clobber
data.note: Leads to da' Gud Plan!
data.description: Slashes for 202 damage, and generates extra hate against monsters.

data.name: Lob Choppa
data.description: A basic throwing attack that inflicts 104 damage. Has a chance to deal 703 damage to a severely wounded target if you are behind them.

data.name: Keep It Goin'!
data.description: Increases damage on Big Slash to 255 and reduces cost by 10 Action Points.

data.name: Arm Breaka
data.note: Leads to da' Gud Plan!
data.description: Deals 164 damage. Removes 50 Action Points over 5 seconds.

data.name: Gork Smash!
data.description: Increases Critical Hit Chance by 10% when you have a Gud' Plan, and 20% while you have Da' Best Plan.

data.name: Not in da face!
data.note:
Needs da' Best Plan!!
No Plan after dis!
data.description: Deals 277 damage. Increases cooldowns on target by 5 seconds for 10 seconds. Group members within 100 feet become Unstoppable for 4 seconds, granting immunity to all Stagger, Knockdown, Disarm, or Silence effects.

data.name: Guud at Big Choppin!
data.description: When you are wielding a Greatweapon, your chance to parry is increased by 5% and all damage you deal is increased by 10%.

data.name: T'ree Hit Combo
data.note:
Needs da' Best Plan!!
No Plan after dis!
data.description: You swing your weapon lots, dealing 307 damage every 0.75 seconds for 3 seconds. As Da' Big Boss would say, "Countin' is for Stuntiez."

data.name: Puddle o Muck
data.description: Deals 1800 damage over 15 seconds to all targets 40 feet in front of you. Affected targets are snared by 40% for 15 seconds.

data.name: Less Stabbin' Me
data.description: Increases Block and Parry by 5% when you have a Gud' Plan, and 10% while you have Da' Best Plan.

data.name: Ya Missed Me
data.note:
Requires Block
Leads to da' Gud Plan!
data.description: Deals 164 undefendable damage. Target's physical damage done is reduced to 80% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Stop Hittin' Da Runts
data.description: You gain 40 Action Points whenever one of your War Bellows trigger.

data.name: Can't Hit Me!
data.note: Requires Shield
data.description: Increase Block Chance by 50%. While you are channeling, you can move at 60% movement speed. After you block, the attacker takes 262 damage.

data.name: Mor' Hardcore
data.description: Right in Da Jibblies and Ya Missed Me will now knock targets back a medium distance.

data.name: Down Ya Go
data.note:
Needs da' Best Plan!!
No Plan after dis!
data.description: Deals 502 damage and knocks target down for 3 seconds.

data.name: Cant' Touch Us
data.note: Requires Shield
data.description: Group members within 100 feet will gain 200 Action Points and will absorb up to 4500 damage over 15 seconds.

data.name: You Got Nuffin'
data.description: When War Bellows trigger they will now restore 405 health over 10 seconds to your group members within 100 feet of you.

data.name: We'z Bigger
data.note:
Needs da' Gud Plan!
Leads to da' Best Plan!!
data.description: Deals 239 damage. Increases the armor of all groupmates within 20 feet by 660 for 20 seconds.

data.name: Big Brawlin'
data.description: Big Swing now Snares for 40% for 5 seconds and Disorients, increasing build times by 25%.

data.name: Rock 'Ard
data.note: Leads to da' Gud Plan!
data.description: Deals 164 damage. Activates protective shield that absorbs up to 600 over 5 seconds.

data.name: No Choppin' Me
data.description: Follow 'me Lead will also buff all groupmates within 30 feet of the defensive target.

data.name: WAAAAAAAGH!
data.note:
Needs da' Best Plan!!
No Plan after dis!
data.description: Deals 248 Corporeal damage to all targets within 30 feet. Also reduces target's Corporeal resistance by 378 for 20 seconds.

data.name: Yer Nothin
data.description: Deals 1800 damage over 12 seconds to all targets within 30 feet in of you.  Affected targets lose 30 seconds of Morale over 12 seconds.
